Headline: #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp.Temp Northbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Michigan
ShortDescription: NB 120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Exp. buses are temp. rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #120 Ogilvie/Streeterville Express buses are temporarily rerouted via: Lower Wacker, Columbus, and Fairbanks, due to, street blockage, near Lower Wacker/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
